screenReaderInformation.static: Chart titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart.

interactive.line: Keyboard interactive line chart, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.
interactive.scatter: Keyboard interactive scatter plot, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.
interactive.bar: Keyboard interactive bar chart, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.
interactive.slope: Keyboard interactive slope chart, titled '{{ CHART_TITLE }}'. This section contains additional information about this chart. Pressing TAB takes you to the chart area.

keyboardInstructions: Press ENTER on the chart area or a group to drill down a level. Press ESCAPE to drill up a level. Press TAB to exit the chart. Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to move between sibling elements. Use UP and DOWN arrows to move across groups.

line.withSingleSymbol: This is a line chart with a single line.
line.withMultipleSymbols: This is a line chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} lines.

scatter.withSingleSymbol: This is a scatter plot with a single data point.
scatter.withMultipleSymbols: This is a scatter plot with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} data points.

bar.withSingleSymbol: This is a bar chart with a single bar.
bar.withMultipleSymbols: This is a bar chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} bars.

slope.withSingleSymbol: This is a slope chart with a single line.
slope.withMultipleSymbols: This is a slope chart with {{ N_CHART_ELEMENTS }} lines.

withLabelAndDirectionAndTicks.continuous: This chart has a continuous {{ AXIS_DIRECTION }} axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with a range that starts with {{ START_TICK }} and ends with {{ END_TICK }}.
withLabelAndDirectionAndTicks.categorical: This chart has a categorical {{ AXIS_DIRECTION }} axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with ticks {{ TICKS }}.

withLabelAndTicks.continuous: This chart has a continuous axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with a range that starts with {{ START_TICK }} and ends with {{ END_TICK }}.
withLabelAndTicks.categorical: This chart has a categorical axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}, with ticks {{ TICKS }}.

axis.withLabelAndDirection: This chart has a {{ AXIS_DIRECTION }} axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}.
axis.withLabel: This chart has an axis, titled {{ AXIS_LABEL }}.

controller.label: {{ CHART_TITLE }}. {{ CHART_SUBTITLE }}. Navigate into the chart area by pressing ENTER.
